subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Jack Nicklaus, Arnold Palmer, Tom Watson and Johnny Miller played 18 holes along Lake Michigan in Benton Harbor, site of the Nicklaus-designed Golf Club at Harbor Shores.
snippet: Jack Nicklaus, Arnold Palmer, Tom Watson and Johnny Miller played 18 holes along Lake Michigan in Benton Harbor, site of the Nicklaus-designed Golf Club at Harbor Shores.
